DataElement.preferredDefinition: Uncontrollable craving, seeking, and use of a substance such as a drug or alcohol._changed in form or character._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI)_Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.
